recipe.title: Moussaka
recipe.description: Layered Greek casserole with eggplant, meat sauce, and béchamel

steps.descr: Salt and drain eggplant slices for 30 minutes
steps.instructions: Salt and drain eggplant slices for 30 minutes

on_enter.say: Right, let's salt those eggplant slices and let them drain for thirty minutes. This will remove any bitterness and make them perfect for our dish.

steps.descr: Grill or fry eggplant until golden
steps.instructions: Grill or fry eggplant until golden

on_enter.say: Now, let's grill or fry those eggplant slices until they're beautifully golden. You'll know they're ready when they have a lovely golden colour.

steps.descr: Make meat sauce: brown lamb, add onion and tomatoes, simmer
steps.instructions: Make meat sauce: brown lamb, add onion and tomatoes, simmer

on_enter.say: Let's get started on the meat sauce. Brown the lamb, then add the onions and tomatoes. Let it all simmer until it's rich and fragrant.

steps.descr: Make béchamel: melt butter, add flour, whisk in milk
steps.instructions: Make béchamel: melt butter, add flour, whisk in milk

on_enter.say: Time to make the béchamel sauce. Melt the butter, add the flour, and whisk in the milk until it's smooth and creamy.
Let's start layering. Begin with the eggplant, then the meat sauce, and repeat until you've used it all up.
Now, let's top it all off with our lovely béchamel sauce and a generous sprinkle of Parmesan.

steps.descr: Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes until golden
steps.instructions: Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes until golden

on_enter.say: Right, let's pop it in the oven at one hundred eighty degrees celsius for forty-five minutes. It'll be ready when it's golden and bubbling.

notes.text:
Salting eggplant removes bitterness
Let rest 15 minutes before cutting
Even better the next day
